description: Brown, Ron, 1943- -- Photographs; Peled, Rafi, 1944- -- Photographs
label: US Secretary of Commerce Ron Brown headed a delegation - which included US businessmen - to the Middle East in early February and paid visits to Israel, the territories, Egypt, Jordan, Kuwait and Qatar.
